Lyric:
[by:KSHMRĺ¤Ťäşş]
[00:03.706] Do you feel the same when I'm away from you?
[00:08.530] Do you know the line that I'd walk for you?
[00:13.574] We could turn around, or we could give it up
[00:17.115] But we'll take what comes, take what comes
[00:23.022] Oh the storm is raging against us now
[00:27.671] If you're afraid of falling then don't look down
[00:32.450] But we took the step, or we took the leap
[00:36.539] And we'll take what comes, take what comes
[00:41.756] Feel the wind in your hair
[00:46.625] Feel the rush way up here
[00:50.488] We're walking the wire, love
[00:55.550] We're walking the wire, love
[01:00.243] We're gonna be higher, up
[01:04.860] We're walking the wire, wire, wire
[01:10.033] There's nights we had that just walk away
[01:15.217] And there's tears we'll cry, but those tears will fade
[01:20.492] It's the price we pay when it comes to love
[01:25.027] And we'll take what comes, take what comes
[01:29.637] Feel the wind in your hair, feel the rush way up here
[01:38.268] We're walking the wire, love
[01:43.211] We're walking the wire, love
[01:48.055] We're gonna be higher, up
[01:52.797] We're walking the wire, wire, wire
[01:57.861] So look out down below
[02:03.250] Look out down below
[02:07.330] Look out down below
[02:12.207] Walking the wire, wire, wire
[02:17.456] So look out down below
[02:23.093] Oh, I'll take your hand when thunder roars
[02:27.668] And I hold you close, I'll stay the course
[02:32.415] I promise you from up above
[02:36.773] That we'll take what comes, take what comes, love
[02:46.049] We're walking the wire, love
[02:50.548] We're walking the wire, love
[02:55.248] We're gonna be higher, up
[03:00.108] We're walking the wire, wire, wire
[03:05.119] So look out down below
